definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
military orders are like mountains (idiom)/a military order must be obeyed
against orders/to disobey/to refuse to accept orders
to request recognition for sb's merits/to recommend sb for promotion or an award
variant of 尚方劍|尚方剑[shang4 fang1 jian4]/imperial sword (giving bearer arbitrary powers)/in fiction, Chinese version of 007's license to kill
win or lose, it all ends here/this is the moment to shine
pinyin: cheng2 bai4 zai4 ci3 yi1 ju3

definition: to shrink back as the time for battle approaches (idiom)/to get cold feet
to agree on three laws (idiom)/three-point covenant/(fig.) preliminary agreement/basic rules
lit. to break the cauldrons and sink the boats (idiom); fig. to cut off one's means of retreat/to burn one's boats

pinyin: bu4 cheng2 gong1 bian4 cheng2 ren2
